name: ASOIAF Name Generator
description: Craving a name worthy of Westeros? Forge your destiny with our A Song of Ice and Fire Name Generator! Whether you're plotting your rise to the Iron Throne or just need a badass name for your D&D character, we've got you covered. Winter is coming... but first, let's get you named!
introduction: Tired of boring names? Want to sound like you belong in the Seven Kingdoms? Our ASOIAF Name Generator blends the noble flair of the Starks, the cunning of the Lannisters, and the wild spirit of the Free Folk to create a name that's uniquely yours. Prepare to be amazed!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A glorious, lore-accurate ASOIAF name will appear before your very eyes.
Not feeling the first result? No problem! Click again for a fresh, equally awesome name. We've got enough combinations to name an entire army.
Want to tweak it? Use the prefixes and suffixes as inspiration to craft your own unique ASOIAF name.
Share your epic new name with your friends and role-playing buddies. Prepare for envy!

faqs.question: Is this generator lore-accurate?
faqs.answer: We've poured over the books and the show to ensure our name combinations feel authentic to the world of A Song of Ice and Fire. While not *every* name will be directly from the source material, the style and feel will definitely transport you to Westeros.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider it a gift from the Old Gods and the New. Go forth and write epic tales!

faqs.question: Will this generator give me a Targaryen name?
faqs.answer: While we don't guarantee a *specific* house name, the combinations often lean towards that noble, slightly-unhinged vibe. Keep generating, and you might just find your dragon name!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: As free as the air you breathe in King's Landing (before someone tries to poison you, of course). Use it to your heart's content!

faqs.question: How does the generator work?
faqs.answer: Our magical algorithm combines carefully selected prefixes and suffixes inspired by ASOIAF characters and locations. It's like a Maester's secret formula... but for names!

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send us your ideas, and if they're truly worthy, we might just add them to the generator. Help us make it even more epic!
